title: Renovate America Inc. filed for bankruptcy and mail me a proof of claim from.
question: call the phone number for the company and was transfer to an attorney that was very vague about if I should fill out the claim? basically said contact a attorney if I have question.
answers: The lawyer for the debtor is not your lawyer and owes you no answers. File the proof of claim and do it before the deadline indicated.
Protect your claim - file the proof of claim timely. As suggested, contact a bankruptcy attorney for assistance if needed.

If you believe they owe you money then you should file a claim, as its the only way you will likely recieve anything on the debt. If you aren't sure, contact a bankruptcy attorney to determine if you have a claim to file.

File your Proof of Claim with the evidence of your debt. If you don't know how to do it, what to attach, or where to mail it, find/consult/hire a lawyer in your area using the Avvo feature "Find a Lawyer". Make a list of 4-5 having many 5 star reviews from satisfied clients. If you don't get a prompt call back from one, go on to the next on your list. Some offer a free consultation by phone or in person. Take us up on it.
